title: Well done, Illinois! This was wonderful news last night- may reason, equal justice for ALL, and progress...

attachments.displayName:
Well done, Illinois! This was wonderful news last night- may reason, equal justice for ALL, and progress of truth and acceptance help get the rest of the states on board too!

It took about 100 years to have...by Law...equal rights for humans of any color in every state (& we still struggle with it). Almost 60 years for all states to have...by Law...equal right for women (& we still struggle with it). Suspect we will take about as much time for this, but it is a HUGE step in the right direction to prove that we really do hold these truths to be self-evident, that ALL humans are created equal.

object.content:
Well done, Illinois! This was wonderful news last night- may reason, equal justice for ALL, and progress of truth and acceptance help get the rest of the states on board too! 

It took about 100 years to have...by Law...equal rights for humans of any color in every state (& we still struggle with it). Almost 60 years for all states to have...by Law...equal right for women (& we still struggle with it). Suspect we will take about as much time for this, but it is a HUGE step in the right direction to prove that we really do hold these truths to be self-evident, that ALL humans are created equal.
